sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  .app
    swiper(:options="swiperOption")
      swiper-slide(v-for="(slide, index) in swiperSlides" :key="index")
        img(:src="slide")
    .app-container
      header
        img.logo(src="./assets/images/logo.svg")
        .swiper-pagination(slot="pagination")
      main
        .room-item
          img(src="")
        .room-item
          img(src="")
        .room-item
          img(src="")
        .room-item
          img(src="")
        .room-item
          img(src="")
        .room-item
          img(src="")

</template>

<script>
import { swiper, swiperSlide } from 'vue-awesome-swiper'

import index_bg01 from './assets/images/index_bg01.jpeg'
import index_bg02 from './assets/images/index_bg02.jpeg'
import index_bg03 from './assets/images/index_bg03.jpeg'
import index_bg04 from './assets/images/index_bg04.jpeg'

import 'swiper/dist/css/swiper.css'

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    swiper,
    swiperSlide
  },
  data () {
    return {
      swiperOption: {
        slidesPerView: 1,
        effect: 'fade',
        loop: true,
        pagination: {
          el: '.swiper-pagination',
          bulletClass: 'swiper-pagination__bullet',
          bulletActiveClass: 'swiper-pagination__bullet--active',
          clickable: true
        }
      },
      swiperSlides: [
        index_bg01,
        index_bg02,
        index_bg03,
        index_bg04
      ]
    }
  },
  created () {

  },
  mounted () {
  },
  computed: {

  },
  methods: {
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="stylus">
  .swiper-pagination
    &__bullet
      margin: 0 12px;
      width: 16px;
      height: 16px;
      opacity: 0.6;
      background-color: #333;
      border-radius: 50%;
      display: inline-block;
      cursor: pointer;
      &--active
        background-color: #b79f15;

</style>

<style lang="stylus" scoped>
.swiper-base
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 8% 0 4%;
  background-image: radial-gradient(circle at 50% 35%, #f1f4e9, #e5dfc0);
  &__container
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
.swiper-container
  width: 88%;
.swiper-pagination
  position: relative;
  padding: 41px;
  text-align: center;
.swiper-navigation
  width: 6%;
  text-align: center;
  cursor: pointer;

</style>
